main.name: Dharmesh Kumar
main.description: I eat, sleep and breathe JS
main.bio: I wish to work in a concern where I can deliver and develop skills for the mutual benefit of myself and the concern. My passion for learning and my experience in web development will help me optimizing web functionalities that improve the efficiency of workflow and deliver work on time.

education.school: Adithya Institute of Technology - Coimbatore, India
education.description: Graduated with First Class Honours (CGPA: 6.69/10) - Best Outgoing Student of the batch (2014 - 2018)

work.company: Infinijith Apps & Technologies Pvt Ltd - Coimbatore, India
work.title: Web Development Intern
work.description: Learnt javascript frameworks such as React Js, API integration using Node, and Database such as MySQL, MongoDB as an intern and my self-learning skills helped me a lot to learn more things.

work.company: FICE Education Pvt Ltd - Bangalore, India
work.title: IoT & Data Science Intern
work.description: Completed courses such as loT. Python for Data Science, NLP, Machine Learning through EdX portal and mentored over 30 students for their loT projects and helping them to learn courses.

skills.name: CSS & UI (Bootstrap, Material UI, Tailwind CSS)

testimonials.text: Developing with Dharmesh has been AWESOME, he makes developing React so easy and approachable!
testimonials.user: Praveen Kumar, Web Developer - Isithora software solutions

testimonials.text: Dharmesh is one of the best among all the people I have ever worked with. As I remember, Dharmesh was a very productive person, is hardworking, broad-minded and forward thinking individual. Intelligent, ambitious, energetic and proactive perfectionist. Desire for proficiency and education makes Dharmesh a valuable asset to the team. Working with Dharmesh is a signature of success.
testimonials.user: Naveen Kumar S, Senior Web Developer - Infinijith Apps and Technologies Pvt Ltd

testimonials.text: It's been so happy to avail service from Dharmesh. We wanted a website to attract customers with self-explained info about the product and also in simple words. We were so happy that we got the right person. Dharmesh delivered the website, taken care of deployment and also suggested good ideas for our professional development.
testimonials.user: Mr. Naveen Sakthi, Founder & Chairman, Sakthi Constructions Pvt Ltd

testimonials.text: Dharmesh delivered the website on time and has developed what was preferably on my mind, taken all the suggestions and tweaked the UI based on my thought.
testimonials.user: Mr. Ramesh, Co-founder, New Horizon Wealth Management Services
